title: The Wizard of Waterdeep
content: . The strange book we found - 'The Necromancy of Thay' - has enough Weave to interest Gale. We gave Gale a potent magical item, and he was able to absorb the Weave inside. His condition has stabilised, though he warned us that it is an ongoing struggle. We should be prepared for the next time the need arises.
